info.name: sys-compass API
info.description: NestJS API for the **sys-compass** application developed as the 3rd challenge at the week 12 of Compass.UOL's FullStack Journey 2023. The full project can be found at the following [**GitHub repository**](https://github.com/camilafbarcellos/sys-compass) > **Developed by Camila Barcellos - 2023**

item.name: USERS

request.description:
List **all users**.

- Cannot response the password
- In case of success return **200** with the users

response.name: GET USERS

request.description:
Retrieve information about a **specific user**.

- Cannot response the password
- In case of success return **200** with the users
- If the ID is not found, return **404**

Register a **new user**.

- The birthdate must be less than today
- `profile_photo` is optional
- Cannot response the password
- In case of success return **201** with the user registered
- If the request has any invalid fields, return **400** informing the error

**Update** information of a **specific user**.

- Cannot response the password
- In case of success return **200** with the user
- If the ID is not found, return **404**

**Remove** a **specific user**.

- In case of success return **204** with empty body
- If the ID is not found, return **404**

item.description: This route allows performing operations related to the **users** MongoDB collection.

item.name: POSTS

request.description:
List **all posts**.

- In case of success return **200** with the posts

response.name: GET POSTS

request.description:
Retrieve information about a **specific post**.

- In case of success return **200** with the post

response.name: GET POST

request.description:
Create a **new post**.

- `likes` is created by the api, initialized with 0
- In case of success return **201** with the post
- If the request has any invalid fields, return **400** informing the error

**Update** information of a **specific post**.

- In case of success return **200** with the post
- If the ID is not found, return **404**
- If the request has any invalid fields, return **400** informing the error

**Remove** a **specific post**.

- In case of success return **204** with empty body
- If the ID is not found, return **404**

item.description: This route allows performing operations related to the **posts** MongoDB collection in general.

item.name: COMMENTS

request.description:
List **all comments** on the post.

- In case of success return **200** with the comments

response.name: GET COMMENTS

request.description:
Retrieve information about a **specific commen**t on the post.

- In case of success return **200** with the comment

response.name: GET COMMENT

request.description:
Add a **new comment** to the post.

- In case of success return **201** with the comment
- If the request has any invalid fields, return **400** informing the error

response.name: ADD COMMENT

request.description:
**Update** information of a **specific comment** on the post.

- In case of success return **200** with the comment
- If the ID is not found, return **404**
- If the request has any invalid fields, return **400** informing the error

response.name: UPDATE COMMENT

request.description:
**Remove** a **specific comment**.

- In case of success return **204** with empty body
- If the ID is not found, return **404**

item.description:
This route allows performing operations related to **comments on a specific post**.

> **Obs.:** in this case, comments are an array atribute of the posts MongoDB collection

item.name: AUTH

request.description:
**Login** a user and generates it's JWT token.

- n case of success return **200** with the JWT token
- If the request has any invalid fields or wrong credentials return **400** informing the error

**Validates** the user's JWT token.

- In case of success return **200** with the token informations
- If the request has any invalid fields or invalid token return **400** informing the error

item.description: This route allows to **authenticate a user** using JWT.
